column2: "Ya, well, I could go, but look, wouldn't that be boring? Wouldn't I be seeing too much of the results?"
"So, I'm gonna stuff my anger way down deep inside and let you handle it instead! What do you say?"
"I know you're the better choice for the job, plus you can get some major stress relief by smacking down those annoying little critters."
"I'm counting on you! I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face. Don't let me down!"
